verse.name: v1
verse.lines: While shepherds watched their flocks by night, all seated on the ground, an angel of the Lord came down, and glory shone around.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: "Fear not," said he, for mighty dread had seized their troubled mind; "Glad tidings of great joy I bring to you and all mankind.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: "To you, in David's town, this day, is born of David's line a Savior, who is Christ the Lord; and this shall be the sign:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: "The heav'nly Babe you there shall find to human view displayed, all meanly wrapped in swaddling clothes and in a manger laid."

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Thus spoke the seraph, and forthwith appeared a shining throng of angels, praising God, and thus addressed their joyful song:

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: "All glory be to God on high, and to the earth be peace; goodwill henceforth from heav'n to men begin and never cease."
